name: Pung (Ducking Donuts)
description:
Pung is a bad version of Pong where you can only jump to hit the ball while it gets faster every hit.

It's my first game and it's only a prototype for a future Pong related project.

Since it is my first game some honest feedback will help me a lot, thanks. 

- Ducking Donuts

Controls

-P1: W 

-P2: I

!!ONLY 2 PLAYERS, NO BOT!!
